name: offensive
description: Fast and boilerplate-free precondition checks for javascript.

scripts.all: npm run clean-build && npm run all-tests
scripts.build: npm run generate && cd src && tsc
scripts.copy-config: cp package* ./lib && cp *.md ./lib && cd lib && npm shrinkwrap --production
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy-config
scripts.test: cd src && TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.test.json TS_NODE_FILES=1 mocha -r source-map-support/register -r ts-node/register ./test/harness.ts $(find . -name "${PATTERN}")
scripts.uninstall-dev-deps: npm uninstall $(npm ls --depth=0 2>/dev/null | grep -v offensive | cut -d' ' -f2 | sed -r 's/@[^@]+$//')
scripts.deploy: npm install && npm run clean-build && npm run all-tests && cd lib && ln -sf ../node_modules . && npm run uninstall-dev-deps && npm publish
